parameters.name: dcmRevokeRejection
parameters.description: if true, return Rejection Note(s) used to revoke rejection; false if absent

parameters.name: codeValue
parameters.description: Code Value of Rejection Note

parameters.name: codingSchemeDesignator
parameters.description: Coding Scheme Designator of Rejection Note

parameters.name: rejectedBefore
parameters.description: maximum reject date of instances to delete. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: keepRejectionNote
parameters.description: if true, keep rejection note instances - only delete rejected instances; false if absent

404.description: no rejection note with specified codeValue and codingSchemeDesignator configured

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Storage Commitment Status to filter by

parameters.name: studyUID
parameters.description: Unique Identifier of the Study to filter by

parameters.name: exporterID
parameters.description: Exporter ID to filter by

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: number of skipped Storage Commitment Results before first result in returned list

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: maximal number of Storage Commitment Results in returned list

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Storage Commitment Status to filter by

parameters.name: updatedBefore
parameters.description: maximum update date of Storage Commitment Result to filter by. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: transactionUID
parameters.description: Transaction UID of Storage Commitment

parameters.name: uriScheme
parameters.description: only return Storage Systems of a particular type

parameters.name: dicomAETitle
parameters.description: only return Storage Systems used by a particular AE

parameters.name: usage
parameters.description: only return Storage Systems used for the specified content

parameters.name: usableSpaceBelow
parameters.description: only return Storage Systems which have usable space below specified value
